snippet.title: In Ashes - Announcement Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
✨ Wishlist now on Steam! https://bit.ly/43goHzo 

In Ashes is a choice-driven fantasy visual novel about adventurers, monsters, and legends.
An unexpected quest has reached your sleepy town. Once again, you must raise your weapon and step into the boots of a weary, burnt out adventurer. When faced with a choice, what kind of hero will you be? 

Coming to Steam & Itch.io.

Developer: Studio Ephua
Reach us at contact[@]ephua[.]uk

Interested on where else you can follow us? 

✦ Blue Sky: https://studioephua.bsky.social

#gaming #games #trailers #visualnovel #otome #indiegame
